hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The DateTime the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: batchId
hasAttributes.description: Systems generated ID for batch

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressAdditionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the billing address

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building billing address of the supplier

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city in the billing address of the supplier

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard. Example NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number of the billing address of the supplier

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the building where the billing address is located.

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressRegion
hasAttributes.description: Country specific code to indicate regions / provinces within the tax authority. Preferably described according to ISO 3166-2. Example: GB-KEN for Kent county in the United Kingdom.

hasAttributes.name: billingAddressStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The street listed in the billing adress of the supplier

hasAttributes.name: branchStoreNumber
hasAttributes.description: Branch or Storenumber, additional segregation of customer/supplier, used if not included as part of the customer/supplier id

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, and so on at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: customerInfoCustomerId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the customer from whom payment is expected or to whom unused credits have been applied.  Must match a Customer_Account_ID in the Customer_Master_Listing_YYYYMMDD file.

hasAttributes.name: customerInfoName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the customer

hasAttributes.name: glLineCreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit  side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glLineDebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit  side of the transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glPostingDate
hasAttributes.description: Date posting to GL

hasAttributes.name: glTax1CreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the Tax1 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glTax1DebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the Tax1 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glTax2CreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the Tax2 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glTax2DebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the Tax2 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glTax3CreditAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the credit side of the Tax3 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: glTax3DebitAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account number on which the debit side of the Tax3 transaction has been posted.

hasAttributes.name: groupingCode
hasAttributes.description: Grouping mechanism for related items in a batch or grouping of invoices, such as the invoice grouping found in certain ERP systems

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No  multicurrency translation should need to be  performed on this amount because all  transactions should be recorded in a single  currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The functional or group currency related to  the invoice amount. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountLocal
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount in local  currency. Usually the amount seen on the original  invoice document.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the invoice, regardless of the  date the invoice is entered. This is the date from which the due date is calculated based  on the invoice terms.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDocumentReference
hasAttributes.description: The invoice number associated with the Sales Invoice by the entity

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDueDate
hasAttributes.description: The date payment is due from the customer. Aging of a receivable is usually calculated  based on this date.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each invoice. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, document number, document type, and year) to uniquely identify each transaction. The same ID must be used for all tables with invoice data (Invoices_Received_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMM DD, Open_Accounts_Payables_YYYYMMDD, AP_Cash_Application_YYYYMMDD_YYYYM MDD, and AP_Adjustments_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMDD).

hasAttributes.name: invoiceLineAmountReporting
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceLineLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The currency for local reporting  requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceLineReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The reporting currency related to the invoice reporting amount for non consolidated reporting. See ISO4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The currency for local reporting requirements. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: invoiceNo
hasAttributes.description: Identification number for an internally generated sales invoice ( to outside customer ).

hasAttributes.name: invoiceReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: The reporting currency related to the invoice reporting amount for nonconsolidated reporting. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: documentType
hasAttributes.description: Type of invoice: Debit invoice, Credit invoice, Cash, Ticket, etc

hasAttributes.name: lineAccountId
hasAttributes.description: General Ledger Account code of the GL-revenue-account. Can be including sub-account id. It can contain many different levels to identify the Account. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group and branch/department.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded  in the functional or group currency. No  multicurrency translation should be performed on this amount because  all transactions should be recorded in a  single currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount in loca l currency.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: The functional or group currency related to the invoice amount. See ISO 4217 coding.

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisId
hasAttributes.description: Value of the analysisID: f.i. which cost center applies

hasAttributes.name: lineAnalysisType
hasAttributes.description: Analysis code identifier: cost center, cost unit, cost type, project, etc. Refers to the MasterFile AnalysisTypeTable

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedBy
hasAttributes.description: User ID (from User_Listing file) for person  who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineApprovedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: lineCreditNoteReason
hasAttributes.description: Credit note reason or rationale

hasAttributes.name: lineCreditNoteReference
hasAttributes.description: Credit note reference (where applicable) to original invoice

hasAttributes.name: lineDebitCreditIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amounts on line-level are debit or credit amounts. Entry must correspond to entry reflected in General Ledger Entry. Signing of line amounts is relative to this indicator. E.g. a return can lead to a negative amount

hasAttributes.name: lineDeliveryDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the delivery

hasAttributes.name: lineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of Invoice Line.

hasAttributes.name: lineFromDate
hasAttributes.description: Start date of the deliveries

hasAttributes.name: lineGoodsServicesId
hasAttributes.description: Indicator showing if goods or service

hasAttributes.name: lineGroupingCode
hasAttributes.description: Grouping mechanism for related items in a batch or grouping of invoices, such as the invoice grouping found in certain ERP systems

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceDueDate
hasAttributes.description: The date payment is due to the supplier. Not all transactions will have a due date (for example, credit memos). Aging of a payable is usually calculated based on this date.

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceLineAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount In functional currency of that entity

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceLineAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in foreign currency

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceLineAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceLineAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceProductGroup01
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #1, for example, tires or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceProductGroup02
hasAttributes.description: Product descriptor #2, for example, tires or accessories.

hasAttributes.name: lineInvoiceUOM
hasAttributes.description: Quantity unit of measure e.g. pack of 13

hasAttributes.name: lineLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Line item number of the invoice.

hasAttributes.name: lineMovementReference
hasAttributes.description: Unique reference to the movement.

hasAttributes.name: lineOrderDate
hasAttributes.description: Date of order

hasAttributes.name: lineOriginatingON
hasAttributes.description: Origination Order Number

hasAttributes.name: lineProductCode
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier for each purchased product. This ID may need to be created by concatenating fields (for example, business unit, product number, year, and so on) to uniquely identify each product.

hasAttributes.name: lineProductDescription
hasAttributes.description: Product (plain English) description to  indicate the name or other identifying  characteristics of the product.

hasAttributes.name: lineQuantity
hasAttributes.description: Quantity of goods and services supplied.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Sales order ID for invoiced items.  Must match Sales_Order_ID in the Sales_Orders_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMM DD file. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineSalesOrderLineId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for sales order line number. Must match Sales_Order_Line_ID used in Sales_Orders_Lines_YYYYMMDD_YY YYMMDD file. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromAdditionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the shipping address

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building shipping address the goods will be despatched from

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city the goods will be despatched from

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard. Example NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromDeliveryDate
hasAttributes.description: Date goods are delivered

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromDeliveryId
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the delivery

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromLocationId
hasAttributes.description: Location of the warehouse from where the goods are shipped to customer.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number of the address from where the goods will be despatched

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the shipping address

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromRegion
hasAttributes.description: Country specific code to indicate regions / provinces within the tax authority. Preferably described according to ISO 3166-2. Example: GB-KEN for Kent county in the United Kingdom.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromStreetName
hasAttributes.description: Street name from where the goods are shipped ex: St. Marks street , Church street

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromUCR
hasAttributes.description: Unique consignment reference number

hasAttributes.name: lineShipFromWarehouseId
hasAttributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress, or stock-in-transit

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount In functional currency of that entity

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in transaction currency - USD , EUR , GBP , INR

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineShippingCostsAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToAdditionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the address to which items will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building shipping to address

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city to which the goods will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard. Example NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToDeliveryDate
hasAttributes.description: Date goods are delivered

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToDeliveryId
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the delivery

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToLocationId
hasAttributes.description: The addresses to which customers want organisation to send the goods they ordered.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number to which the goods will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the shipping to address

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToRegion
hasAttributes.description: Country specific code to indicate regions / provinces within the tax authority. Preferably described according to ISO 3166-2. Example: GB-KEN for Kent county in the United Kingdom.

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The street to which goods will be delivered

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToUCR
hasAttributes.description: Unique consignment reference number

hasAttributes.name: lineShipToWarehouseId
hasAttributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress, or stock-in-transit

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person  who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: lineSystemModifiedUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount In functional currency of that entity

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in foreign currency

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxAmountExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBase
hasAttributes.description: The base on which the tax is calculated. This can be an amount, or a quantity, eg. Litres.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxBaseDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the value in the TaxBase. Eg. Litres for excises on alcoholic bevarages.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxCode
hasAttributes.description: Tax Code for lookup in tables

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxDeclarationPeriod
hasAttributes.description: The identification of the declaration/return in which the taxamount is reported to the Revenue body

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxExemptionReason
hasAttributes.description: Tax exemption or reduction reason or rationale

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxInformationTaxPercentage
hasAttributes.description: Tax percentage.

hasAttributes.name: lineTaxPointDate
hasAttributes.description: Tax Point date where recorded or if not recorded then the Invoice date

hasAttributes.name: lineToDate
hasAttributes.description: Enddate of the deliveries

hasAttributes.name: lineUnitPrice
hasAttributes.description: Unit price for the unit/group of units per UOM in the header's default currency

hasAttributes.name: lineUOMToUOMBaseConversionFactor
hasAttributes.description: Conversion factor of the InvoiceUOM to UOM Base. Only needed when InvoiceUOM is reported and is different from the UOM Base.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the Effective_Date occurs.Examples include W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: periodYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the Invoice_Date occurs”YYYY for delimited, CCYY-MM-DD fiscal year end (ISO 8601) for extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL).

hasAttributes.name: postingStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction's posting to the GL (for example, "Posted," "Not Posted").

hasAttributes.name: receiptNumbers
hasAttributes.description: The number(s) of the receipt(s) on this "consolidated invoicerecord". Can be a single number, a range or a list.

hasAttributes.name: salesOrderId
hasAttributes.description: Sales order ID for invoiced items.  Must match Sales_Order_ID in the Sales_Orders_YYYYMMDD_YYYYMMDD file. If no sales order, leave blank.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for  profit center, division, fund, program, branch, project, and so on.

hasAttributes.name: selfBillingIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicator showing if a self-billing agreement exists between the customer and the supplier

hasAttributes.name: settlementAmount
hasAttributes.description: In the header's default currency.

hasAttributes.name: settlementCurrencyAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount in foreign currency

hasAttributes.name: settlementCurrencyCode
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard. Example: EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: settlementExchangeRate
hasAttributes.description: The exchange rate used. CurrencyAmount x ExchangeRate = Amount

hasAttributes.name: settlementPaymentMechanism
hasAttributes.description: Payment mechanism

hasAttributes.name: settlementSettlementDate
hasAttributes.description: Date settled

hasAttributes.name: settlementSettlementDiscount
hasAttributes.description: Description Settlement / Other Discount

hasAttributes.name: shipFromAdditionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the shipping address

hasAttributes.name: shipFromAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: shipFromBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building shipping address the goods will be despatched from

hasAttributes.name: shipFromCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city the goods will be despatched from

hasAttributes.name: shipFromCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard. Example NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: shipFromDeliveryDate
hasAttributes.description: Date goods are delivered

hasAttributes.name: shipFromDeliveryId
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the delivery

hasAttributes.name: shipFromLocationId
hasAttributes.description: Location of the warehouse from where the goods are shipped to customer.

hasAttributes.name: shipFromNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number of the address from where the goods will be despatched

hasAttributes.name: shipFromPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the building where the shipping address is located

hasAttributes.name: shipFromRegion
hasAttributes.description: Country specific code to indicate regions / provinces within the tax authority. Preferably described according to ISO 3166-2. Example: GB-KEN for Kent county in the United Kingdom.

hasAttributes.name: shipFromStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the shipping address

hasAttributes.name: shipFromUCR
hasAttributes.description: Unique consignment reference number

hasAttributes.name: shipFromWarehouseId
hasAttributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress, or stock-in-transit

hasAttributes.name: shipToAdditionalAddressDetail
hasAttributes.description: Additional detail required for the address to which items will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: shipToAddressType
hasAttributes.description: Field to differentiate between multiple addresses. To indicate the type of address. Choose from the predefined enumeration. (examples: StreetAddress PostalAddress, BillingAddress)

hasAttributes.name: shipToBuilding
hasAttributes.description: The physical building shipping to address

hasAttributes.name: shipToCity
hasAttributes.description: The physical city to which the goods will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: shipToCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard. Example NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: shipToDeliveryDate
hasAttributes.description: Date goods are delivered

hasAttributes.name: shipToDeliveryId
hasAttributes.description: Identification of the delivery

hasAttributes.name: shipToLocationId
hasAttributes.description: The addresses to which customers want organisation to send the goods they ordered.

hasAttributes.name: shipToNumber
hasAttributes.description: The building or other number to which the goods will be shipped

hasAttributes.name: shipToPostalCode
hasAttributes.description: The zip code of the building where the shipping to address is located

hasAttributes.name: shipToRegion
hasAttributes.description: Country specific code to indicate regions / provinces within the tax authority. Preferably described according to ISO 3166-2. Example: GB-KEN for Kent county in the United Kingdom.

hasAttributes.name: shipToStreetName
hasAttributes.description: The street to which goods will be delivered

hasAttributes.name: shipToUCR
hasAttributes.description: Unique consignment reference number

hasAttributes.name: shipToWarehouseId
hasAttributes.description: Warehouse where goods held - also to identify work-in-progress, or stock-in-transit

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source (code for source from which the journal entry originated, such as sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, and so on).

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the  creation date. This should be a system- generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not  necessarily correspond with the date of the  transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: systemEntryUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: systemId
hasAttributes.description: Unique number created by the system for the document

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was last modified.

hasAttributes.name: systemModifiedUser
hasAttributes.description: User_ID (from User_Listing file) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: tax1Local
hasAttributes.description: The amount of Tax1_Type included in the transaction. Recorded in local currency.

hasAttributes.name: tax1Type
hasAttributes.description: Code for Tax1 type (for example, Sales, VAT). This field should agree with the Regulator_Code field in the Tax_Table_YYYYMMDD

hasAttributes.name: tax1TypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of Tax1 type (for example, authority tax is paid to and other information to identify tax).

hasAttributes.name: tax2Type
hasAttributes.description: Code for Tax2 type (for example, Sales, VAT). This field should agree with the Regulator_Code field in the Tax_Table_YYYYMMDD

hasAttributes.name: tax2Local
hasAttributes.description: The amount of Tax2_Type included in the transaction. Recorded in local currency.

hasAttributes.name: tax2TypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of Tax2 type (for example, authority tax is paid to and other information to identify tax).

hasAttributes.name: tax3Local
hasAttributes.description: The amount of Tax3_Type included in the transaction. Recorded in local currency.

hasAttributes.name: tax3Type
hasAttributes.description: Code for Tax3 type (for example, Sales, VAT). This field should agree with the Regulator_Code field in the Tax_Table_YYYYMMDD

hasAttributes.name: tax3TypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of Tax3 type (for example, authority tax is paid to and other information to identify tax).

hasAttributes.name: termsDiscountDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days from the invoice date the customer ia allowed to take advantage of discounted terms. Terms are represented as digits with no decimal places (for example, nnn).

hasAttributes.name: termsDiscountPercentage
hasAttributes.description: The discount percentage the organisation may provide  to the customer if an invoice is paid before a certain number of days. In the flat file, terms are represented as digits to one decimal place (for example, 10% would be represented as 10.0). In extensible business reporting language global ledger taxonomy framework (XBRL GL), the three fields Terms_Discount_Percentage, Terms_Discount_Days and Terms_Due_Days would be entered in the form "xx.x% dd Net dd," such as 2% 10 Net 30 for 2% discount if paid within 10 days, with the net due in 30 days.

hasAttributes.name: termsDueDays
hasAttributes.description: The number of days allowed to meet the obligation before an invoice becomes overdue.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group and branch/department

hasAttributes.name: paymentTerms
hasAttributes.description: Payments terms for this invoice

hasAttributes.name: invoiceDeletionFlag
hasAttributes.description: Indicates if deletion of incomplete invoices is allowed

hasAttributes.name: source
hasAttributes.description: Indicates that invoice is created manually in receivables or imported from another application

hasAttributes.name: customerid
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer

hasAttributes.name: invoiceType
hasAttributes.description: Type of invoice: Debit invoice, Credit invoice, Cash, Ticket, etc
